title: Somebody please help me I just want to play.
body: This is the first time I've ever tried out LOL because a lot of my friends told me to try it out.  To be honest the main reason I got it is because it's free but right now that seems to be the only good thing about it.  (No offense)  The reason why is because I've been having this extremely frustrating problem on multiplayer.  Every time I try to join a lobby to play with other people on the custom game lobby I get disconnected and they give me this message: " The owner has banned you from this custom game."  Did I do something wrong or something?   Any help at all would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Click play>classic>summoner's rift>intro or beginner

You have to level up to unlock the other stuff, nobody plays custom games to play league. They are used for events, fun games to play, or 1v1s.

As *TSM Morris* mentioned, you may have a better experience playing Co-op VS AI or Summoner's Rift Blind Pick. Custom matches are generally when other players are wanting to play with their friends or people from specific sub-communities of League, and may be a less friendly environment for someone new to League who's trying to learn the ropes.
